title: Proposal Open Contract Request
description: Get the latest price (and other information) for contract(s) in the account's portfolio

contract_id.description: Contract ID received from a `portfolio` request. If not set, you will receive stream of all open contracts.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
